text.section: There is a State Apprenticeship Training Fund in the Department.

The Fund consists of:
payments made by contractors or subcontractors in accordance with this subtitle; and
penalties collected as a result of violations of this subtitle.
The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of this article.
The State Treasurer shall hold the Fund separately, and the Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

The Secretary shall use money in the Fund to:
promote preapprenticeship programs and other workforce development programs in the State's public secondary schools and community colleges that assist students in preparing for and entering apprenticeship training programs; and
pay any costs associated with carrying out the provisions of this subtitle.
